description: System development and integral process activities are defined
Transition criteria and inter-relationship among processes are defined
Aircraft-level functions, functional requirements, functional interfaces and assumptions are defined
Aircraft functions are allocated to systems
System requirements including assumptions and system interfaces are defined.
System derived requirements (including derived safety-related requirements) are defined and rationale explained
System architecture is defined.
System requirements are allocated to items.
Appropriate item, system and aircraft integrations are performed.
The aircraft/system functional hazard assessment is performed.
The preliminary aircraft safety assessment is performed.
The preliminary system safety assessment is performed.
The common cause analyses are performed.
The aircraft safety assessment is performed.
The system safety assessment is performed.
Independence requirements in functions, systems and items are captured.
Aircraft, system, items requirements are complete and correct.
Assumptions are justified and validated.
Derived requirements are justified and validated.
Requirements are traceable.
Validation compliance substantiation is provided.
Test or demonstration procedures are correct.
Verification demonstrates intended function and confidence of no unintended function impacts to safety.
Product implementation complies with aircraft, and system requirements.
Safety requirements are verified.
Verification compliance substantiation is included.
Assessment of deficiencies and their related impact on safety is identified.
Configuration items are identified
Configuration baseline and derivatives are established.
Problem reporting , change control, change review, and configuration status accounting are established.
Archive and retrieval are established.
Assurance is obtained that necessary plans are developed and maintained for all aspects of system certification.
Development activities and processes are conducted in accordance with those plans.
Compliance substantiation is provided.
